ModMetaData.name: Autoharvest Wild Plants
ModMetaData.author: daffodilistic
ModMetaData.description:
A RimWorld mod that automatically marks harvestable wild plants for you. Made for people tired of constantly manually looking around the map for wild plants to harvest.
This is a simple mod that automatically marks wild plants with a red parang icon (i.e the "cut plants" icon) which are fully-grown inside your colonies. Avoids marking plants in growing zones as well.
Note that The marks are not orders, and can be removed either manually, or automatically when the plant dies from natural death or fire.
Modified from source: https://github.com/andrew-raphael-lukasik/rimworld-mod_allow-dead-animals
